root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 13-b-1, translated into en
root.data: Objective 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its repercussions213.b Promote capacity building mechanisms so that the least developed countries and small island developing States equip themselves with effective planning and management capacity to face climate change, with particular emphasis on women, youth, local people and marginalized groups13.b.1 Number of least developed countries and small island developing States receiving specialized support for the establishment of effective planning and management resources in the face of climate change, with particular emphasis on women, youth , the local population and marginalized groups, and the importance of this support in terms of funding, technology and capacity buildingcategory IIICategory III
